title: SNS-Based Self-Directed Social Learning Game Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for advanced social sector practitioners performing project-based assessments in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete social problem-solving projects with over 90% success within three months using gamified elements in SNS platforms.
Learners enhance their social discussion competencies by engaging in peer collaboration activities at least twice weekly in a game-based learning environment.
Learners improve their ability to establish and execute self-directed learning plans by over 80% by the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
